show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #69 Daniel Mushrush "Managing Virgin Prairie"
subtitle: #69 Daniel Mushrush "Managing Virgin Prairie"
summary:
My friend Daniel Mushrush joined me on to share his story about being a part of a successful seed stock business on a multigenerational ranch at the North end of the Kansas Flint Hills.

Www.Mushrushredangus.com
